languages.text: С каждой смертью некрона или ослабленного воителя существо получает +1 уровень эффекта синергия смерти. Каждый уровень дает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и на 20% увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, наносимый оружием. Эффект суммируется. В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо теряет 1 уровень эффекта.
languages.original_text: [draft] With every Warrior's death, this creature gains +1 stack of death synergy gaining +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} per stack. At the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature loses −1 stack.

traits.locale_text: Со смертью каждого воина существо получает +1 уровень эффекта "синергия смерти". Каждый уровень дает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}. В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо теряет 1 уровень эффекта.

Со смертью каждого воина существо получает +1 уровень эффекта "синергия смерти". Каждый уровень дает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}. В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо теряет 1 уровень эффекта.

languages.text:
With every Necron or weakened warrior's death, this creature gains +1 stack of {g|f:c465d95a8a3b4b1792f0055c0fe406af}death synergy{/g}, which grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} and +20% weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks.
At the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature loses −1 stack.
languages.original_text: С каждой смертью некрона или ослабленного воителя существо получает +1 уровень эффекта синергия смерти. Каждый уровень дает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и на 20% увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, наносимый оружием. Эффект суммируется. В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} существо теряет 1 уровень эффекта.

traits.locale_text:
With every Necron or weakened warrior's death, this creature gains +1 stack of death synergy, which grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} and +20% weapon damage. Stacks.
At the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature loses −1 stack.

With every Necron or weakened warrior's death, this creature gains +1 stack of death synergy, which grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} and +20% weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks.
At the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature loses −1 stack.

With every Necron or weakened warrior's death, this creature gains +1 stack of death synergy, which grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} and +20% weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks.
At the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature loses −1 stack.

languages.text:
每当有太空死灵或虚弱状态的战士死亡时，此生物获得1层{g|f:c465d95a8a3b4b1792f0055c0fe406af}“死亡协同”{/g}效果，每层效果可使{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}提高1点，武器{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高20%，此效果可叠加。
当此生物回合{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}结束{/g}时，损失1层“死亡协同”效果。
languages.original_text:
With every Necron or weakened warrior's death, this creature gains +1 stack of {g|f:c465d95a8a3b4b1792f0055c0fe406af}death synergy{/g}, which grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} and +20% weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks.
At the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature loses −1 stack.

traits.locale_text: [暂定] 每当有战士死亡时，此生物获得1层“死亡协同”效果，每层效果可使{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}提高1点，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}提高3点。当此生物{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，损失1层“死亡协同”效果。

languages.text:
ネクロンまたは弱体化した戦士が死亡する度、この生物はデスシナジーを1スタック得る。1スタックにつき、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}+1と、武器{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+20%を得る。この効果はスタックする。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、この生物はスタックを1つ失う。
languages.original_text:
With every Necron or weakened warrior's death, this creature gains +1 stack of death synergy, which grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} and +20% weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks.
At the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature loses −1 stack.

traits.locale_text: [草案]全ての戦士が死ぬと、この生物はデスシナジーのスタックが1増え、スタックごとに{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が+1と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}が+3増加する。その生物は自身の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最後に1スタックを失う。

ネクロンまたは弱体化した戦士が死亡する度、この生物はデスシナジーを1スタック得る。1スタックにつき、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}+1と、武器{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+20%を得る。この効果はスタックする。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、この生物はスタックを1つ失う。

languages.text:
Con la muerte de cada guerrero o Necrón debilitado, esta criatura gana +1 acumulación de {g|f:c465d95a8a3b4b1792f0055c0fe406af}sinergia mortal{/g}, que otorga +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}punto de acción{/g} y 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de arma. Este efecto es acumulativo.
Al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, la criatura pierde −1 acumulación.
languages.original_text:
With every Necron or weakened warrior's death, this creature gains +1 stack of {g|f:c465d95a8a3b4b1792f0055c0fe406af}death synergy{/g}, which grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} and +20% weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks.
At the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature loses −1 stack.

traits.locale_text: Con la muerte de cada guerrero, esta criatura gana +1 acumulación de sinergia mortal, que otorga +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} por acumulación. Al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, la criatura pierde −1 acumulación.

languages.text:
Mit jedem Necron oder geschwächten Krieger erhält diese Kreatur +1 Stapel {g|f:c465d95a8a3b4b1792f0055c0fe406af}"Todessynergie"{/g}, die +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkt{/g} und +20 % Waffen-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} gewährt. Stapelbar.
Am Ende ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} verliert die Kreatur −1 Stapel.
languages.original_text:
With every Necron or weakened warrior's death, this creature gains +1 stack of {g|f:c465d95a8a3b4b1792f0055c0fe406af}death synergy{/g}, which grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} and +20% weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks.
At the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature loses −1 stack.

traits.locale_text: [Entwurf] Mit jedem Tod eines Kriegers erhält diese Kreatur +1 Mal den aufaddierbaren Effekt Todessynergie, was +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} gewährt. Am Ende ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} verliert die Kreatur -1 Mal den aufaddierten Effekt.

languages.text:
À la mort de chaque Nécron ou guerrier affaibli, cette créature acquiert +1 cumul de {g|f:c465d95a8a3b4b1792f0055c0fe406af}Synergie mortelle{/g}, qui lui confère +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}point d'action{/g} et +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} d'arme. Cumulable.
À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, la créature perd 1 cumul.
languages.original_text:
With every Necron or weakened warrior's death, this creature gains +1 stack of {g|f:c465d95a8a3b4b1792f0055c0fe406af}death synergy{/g}, which grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} and +20% weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks.
At the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature loses −1 stack.

traits.locale_text: [brouillon] À la mort de chaque Guerrier, cette créature acquiert +1 cumul de Synergie Mortelle et bénéficie de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} par cumul. À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, cette créature perd -1 cumul.

languages.text:
Bu yaratık, her Nekron veya zayıf düşmüş savaşçının ölümüyle +1 {g|f:c465d95a8a3b4b1792f0055c0fe406af}ölüm sinerjisi{/g} birikimi kazanır. Bu birikimlerden her biri, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanı{/g} ve +%20 silah {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} kazandırır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
Yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sona erdiğinde 1 birikim kaybeder.
languages.original_text:
With every Necron or weakened warrior's death, this creature gains +1 stack of {g|f:c465d95a8a3b4b1792f0055c0fe406af}death synergy{/g}, which grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} and +20% weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks.
At the end of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature loses −1 stack.
